meanings.definition: To stand out or be prominent.
meanings.sent1: During the talent show, Sarah outstood with her amazing singing.
meanings.sent2: The bright red flower outstood among the green leaves in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse outstood in the line of elephants, causing much amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outstood like a beacon in the sea of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountain outstood against the clear blue sky, a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she outstood all her competitors in the race.
meanings.sent2: The old castle outstood for centuries before finally crumbling.
meanings.sent3: The forgotten hero outstood in history books, a tale of the past.
meanings.sent4: His courage outstood the test of time, inspiring generations to come.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins outstood as a reminder of a once great civilization.
